SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into fct_order (ContractID, EmployeeID, EmployeeName, CustomerID, CustomerName, IDCardNumber, BankCardNumber, BankName, StoreID, StoreName, ProductID, ProductName, ContractMoney, AlreadyPeriods, ContractPeriods, RepaymentStartDate, RepaymentEndDate, RepaymentDay, OverDueDays, AdvanceMoney, RepaymentMoney, EntrustStartDate, EntrustEndDate, EntrustCompanyName, Remarks) values (#{contractid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankcardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alreadyperiods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contractperiods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repaymentstartdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{repaymentenddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{repaymentday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overduedays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{advancemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{entruststartdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{entrustenddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{entrustcompanyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update fct_order set ContractID = #{contractid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EmployeeID = #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EmployeeName = #{employeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CustomerID = #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CustomerName = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDCardNumber = #{idcardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BankCardNumber = #{bankcardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BankName = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StoreID = #{storeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StoreName = #{storename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProductID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProductName = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ContractMoney = #{contractmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AlreadyPeriods = #{alreadyperiods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ContractPeriods = #{contractperiods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RepaymentStartDate = #{repaymentstartdate,jdbcType=DATE}, RepaymentEndDate = #{repaymentenddate,jdbcType=DATE}, RepaymentDay = #{repaymentday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OverDueDays = #{overduedays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AdvanceMoney = #{advancemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RepaymentMoney = #{repaymentmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EntrustStartDate = #{entruststartdate,jdbcType=DATE}, EntrustEndDate = #{entrustenddate,jdbcType=DATE}, EntrustCompanyName = #{entrustcompanyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, ContractID, EmployeeID, EmployeeName, CustomerID, CustomerName, IDCardNumber, BankCardNumber, BankName, StoreID, StoreName, ProductID, ProductName, ContractMoney, AlreadyPeriods, ContractPeriods, RepaymentStartDate, RepaymentEndDate, RepaymentDay, OverDueDays, AdvanceMoney, RepaymentMoney, EntrustStartDate, EntrustEndDate, EntrustCompanyName, Remarks from fct_order where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ID, ContractID, EmployeeID, EmployeeName, CustomerID, CustomerName, IDCardNumber, BankCardNumber, BankName, StoreID, StoreName, ProductID, ProductName, ContractMoney, AlreadyPeriods, ContractPeriods, RepaymentStartDate, RepaymentEndDate, RepaymentDay, OverDueDays, AdvanceMoney, RepaymentMoney, EntrustStartDate, EntrustEndDate, EntrustCompanyName, Remarks from fct_order
